text: Where the Heart Is is a 1990 romantic comedy movie. The movie is about a man whose business is to tear down buildings. He is stuck with a building he can't tear down due to its history. He sends his lazy grown children to live there. Joanna Cassidy plays Jean. Dabney Coleman plays Stewart. Uma Thurman plays Daphne. The movie was released on 1 January 1990. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1990 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by John Boorman
title: Where the Heart Is (1990 movie)
